categories: Category:Imperial Intelligence personnel of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Fawste was an Ascendancy Chiss male who served with Imperial Intelligence during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire.

In 3642 BBY, Fawste planned to defect to the Republic since he saw how evil the Empire was. He delivered valuable information to General Karastace Gonn, who was successful in gathering many Imperial traitors to defect to the Republic. However, Darth Baras discovered that Fawste was meeting with General Gonn on Nar Shaddaa and sent his apprentice to eliminate them. After killing Gonn, Fawste begged the Sith Warrior to spare him, but the apprentice ignored his plea and killed him on the spot.
